messages.subject: Does anyone have experience with ADD?
messages.msgSnippet: Curious for some advice about how you detected it. I am well aware of the over-diagnosis of ADD and have resisted this diagnosis for one of my kids for years.
messages.messageBody:
Curious for some advice about how you detected it. I am well aware of the over-diagnosis
of ADD and have resisted this diagnosis for one of my kids for years. But I am at a point
where the teen's personal viewpoint must be taken into account and so we are looking into
whether or not this is something he is dealing with.

Was there specific testing you went through? Did you go through a GP or a Psychiatrist?
Did you choose to use meds? How did the therapy for ADD work for you as an unschooler?

Thanks for advice,
Julie B
